msg: HADOOP-10755. Support negative caching of user-group mapping. Contributed by Lei Xu.

author: stefan2
msg: Use the new private lock file API for FS* lock files as well.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(get_lock_on_filesystem): Call the new API instead using local code.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_x/transaction.c
(get_lock_on_filesystem): Same.

author: rmannibucau
msg: adding my key

author: stefan2
msg: Follow-up to r1611379: Correctly handle all intermittent errors.
Since the same code sequence has been used for FSFS since 2007,
factor it out into some private API function.
* subversion/include/private/svn_io_private.h
(svn_io__file_lock_autocreate): Declare new private API.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c
(svn_io__file_lock_autocreate): Move the file handling code from
the lock() function here and handle
all ordinary and racy errors.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/named_atomic.c
(lock): Call the new function and ensure correct thread mutex use.
Found by: brane
